user.title: NEA Singapore Weather
user.description:
Set up weather and weather sensor entities using weather data from NEA's open API.
Choose to set up just a weather entity, or sensor entities for different areas.

sensor.title: Set up weather sensor entities
sensor.description:
Define a name prefix and choose the areas you want to create weather sensors for.
Choosing "All" will create all 47 sensor entities for all areas tracked by NEA.

data.areas: Select areas in Singapore to create sensor entities
